AbstractText.sentence: In this work, two additional operators were identified within the glpD structural gene at positions 568 to 587 (0(D)3) and 609 to 628 (0(D)4).
The two internal operators bound the glp repressor in the presence or absence of the tandem operators (O(D)1 and O(D)2) in vitro, as shown by DNase I footprinting.

AbstractText.sentence: To assess a potential regulatory role for the two internal operators in vivo, a glpD-lacZ transcriptional fusion containing all four operators was constructed.
